meanings.sent1: The cat rouches low to the ground to sneak up on its prey.
meanings.sent2: She rouches down to pick up the fallen pen.
meanings.sent3: The little boy rouches behind the couch during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The soldier rouches behind the wall, ready to ambush the enemy.
meanings.sent5: The hiker rouches quietly to observe the wildlife without scaring them.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a wrinkled or crinkled texture
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful dress made of soft rouches.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the room had delicate rouches that added elegance.
meanings.sent3: The designer used rouches to give the outfit a unique look.
meanings.sent4: The pillow cover had intricate rouches that made it stand out.
meanings.sent5: The tablecloth had colorful rouches that caught everyone's attention.
